thread.title: Khloé Kardashian Would ‘Rather Gain Ten Pounds’ Than Eat This Food
thread.title_full: Khloé Kardashian Would ‘Rather Gain Ten Pounds’ Than Eat This Food

title: Khloé Kardashian Would ‘Rather Gain Ten Pounds’ Than Eat This Food
text: Khloé Kardashian Would ‘Rather Gain Ten Pounds’ Than Eat This Food More Khloé Kardashian may love a good fried chicken splurge every now and then, but she draws the line at pork. In a game of “Would You Rather” on her app , the Revenge Body and Keeping Up with the Kardashians star answers what seems like a no-brainer for us meat-mongers: Would you rather eat pork or gain ten pounds? Her choice? “I would for sure rather gain ten pounds! I don’t think I’ll ever eat pork in my life.” So…no bacon ? “Turkey bacon only, baby!,” she says. Accordingly, the reality star and meticulous kitchen organizer previously wrote she would have to make tweaks on Thanksgiving stuffing recipes since “all of the recipes have bacon in them.” For more celebrity diet news, follow People Food on Facebook . Beyond sizzling a breakfast pork alternative or devising new twists on classics, Kardashian says she also creates dishes like potato soufflé with her stand mixer. And of course, when she’s not indulging in the occasional cheat day, she maintains a balanced diet and strict workout regimen — which is how she lost 35 lbs . On her healthy food rotation? Armenian rice pilaf with boiled edamame. “The edamame has about 15 grams of protein so I feel good but still satisfied from my rice ,” she says. WATCH THIS: How Khloe Kardashian Dropped 35 Lbs. The “Would You Rather” game steered into other notable territory, including whether she’d have her sisters walk in on her having sex or she’d rather walk in on one of them. “I mean I wouldn’t necessarily want them to walk in on me but I wouldn’t really care either way. It is what it is!” Kardashian says.
